label: Keyword
comment: A significant word, part of word or phrase that is used to enable indexing of or searching within a textual repository, such as a product catalogue or library.

datatypeProperties.comment: A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.

referencedBy.comment: A significant word, part of word or phrase that is used to enable indexing of or searching within a textual repository, such as a product catalogue or library.
